sentences.sentence: A masked white gunman opened fire in a general store in a predominantly African-American neighborhood of Jacksonville before killing himself. Officials said he used a gun painted with a swastika. It was the latest in a series of deadly mass shootings to hit the U.S.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Earlier in Boston, seven people were injured in a shooting during a festival celebrating Caribbean culture. Two suspects were arrested and multiple weapons were recovered during subsequent searches.

sentences.sentence: Police don't believe the incident was connected to the carnival itself, but was the result of a quarrel between two groups.

sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, the Kremlin has published footage of what it says are Russian tankers overseeing motorized rifle units moving towards Kupyansk.
